snippet.title: ARC Raiders | Coming 2025 | Gamescom 2024 Teaser
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders is an upcoming PvPvE third-person action-survival shooter launching in 2025 for $40 USD on PC via Steam and Epic Game Store, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nvidia GeForce Now.

Signing up for Playtesting on Steam for an opportunity to join the first public Tech Test, scheduled for October 24-27, 2024.

Sign up for playtesting on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808500/

Visit the website: https://arcraiders.com/

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ARCRaidersGame

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/arcraiders
